page.heading: IF YOU ASKED JESUS INTO YOUR LIFE AS SAVIOUR AND LORD, MANY THINGS HAVE HAPPENED, INCLUDING:
page.pbutton1: Jesus Has Come Into Your life
page.ptext1: Jesus has come into your life by the Holy Spirit and he will never leave you. (Hebrews 13:5)
page.ptext2: All your sins have been forgiven. (Colossians 1:13-14)
page.pbutton3: You Are Now a Child of God
page.ptext3: You have become a child of God. He is your heavenly father. (Galatians 3:26)
page.ptext4: God has given you new power to live a transformed life. (2 Corinthians 5:17; Ephesians 3:14-21)
page.pbutton5: You Are Now Friends with God
page.ptext5: You have started a friendship with God that will last forever. (John 17:3)
page.question: But how do we know this actually happened?
